#id=1
#text=Last week , my friend and I rode the public bus into town .
#id=2
#text=We looked at a bus schedule and found the bus stop closest to our homes .
#id=3
#text=We got to the bus stop ten minutes before our bus was supposed to arrive and waited .
#id=4
#text=When it arrived , we got into the line to board .
#id=5
#text=Each person in front of us climbed the steps and put a token into the machine at the front of the bus .
#id=6
#text=We had no token , so we gave the bus driver our money and he gave us tokens to put in .
#id=7
#text=We found a seat at the back of the bus and sat down .
#id=8
#text=We checked our bus schedule and decided where we wanted to get off .
#id=9
#text=When the sign at the front of the bus showed that it was our stop , we gathered our things and prepared to get off .
#text=After we got off , we made a note of which bus stop we were at and the time the bus would be there again to take us home .
#text=Then we went off to explore the town .
